name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: ipc.[port_number].decay-scheduler.period-ms
description:
How frequently the decay factor should be applied to the
    operation counts of users. Higher values have less overhead, but respond
    less quickly to changes in client behavior.
    This property applies to DecayRpcScheduler.

name: dfs.default.chunk.view.size
description: The number of bytes to view for a file on the browser.

name: dfs.block.access.token.lifetime
description: The lifetime of access tokens in minutes.

name: dfs.block.scanner.volume.bytes.per.second
description:
If this is configured less than or equal to zero, the DataNode's block scanner will be disabled.  If this
        is positive, this is the number of bytes per second that the DataNode's
        block scanner will try to scan from each volume.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing dead node behavior.

name: dfs.client.failover.connection.retries
description:
Expert only. Indicates the number of retries a failover IPC client
    will make to establish a server connection.
